title: Keybindings don't work until I relog in about 25% of my games
body:
I submitted a support ticket about this 2 weeks ago as well as a bug report on the boards and haven't gotten any feedback so now I'm trying here.  This glitch makes it so I can't use any skills with keyboard shortcuts and have to click on them with my mouse to use them.  This just seemed like an issue with my keyboard at first so I thought nothing of it until it happened over and over again on different champions using different abilities even on different game modes.  I already tried the standard fixes of repairing and reinstalling.  I messed with it a bit and here is everything I have found out about it.  

* This occurs completely randomly and seems to happen about 25% of the time
* Quitting and rejoining from the client used to work but now I have to completely close and relog to fix it
* Champion choice doesn't matter
* Skill choice doesn't matter
* Map doesn't matter
* Using spacebar to lock/unlock screen works (this is set to "Y" as default)
* Self casting using alt + skill works
* Escape brings up the menu
* Tab brings up scoreboard
* If I self cast an ability while using a different ability that it isn't possible to self cast simultaneously, they will both activate.  This is the only way I have found to get them to work and was done by self casting Taric's W and using E at the same time.
* No item actives work except the one I have linked to mouse button 4
* Ping hotkeys (V and G) do not work
* Recall using B does not work
* Shift+right click for attack move click works
* A for auto attacking does not work
* Trying to change keybindings will only work if I use a combination of keys like alt+Q or a mouse button
* I have lost 100% of the 10 games or so this has happened to me in and I will probably get punished by LeaverBuster pretty soon

Help on fixing this issue whether it is technical or through the server would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
Your config files might have gone a little screwy somehow, and each time you login the client grabs the screwy files again which overwrites any changes you made. Follow these steps to do a hard manual reset on those files, and let me know if they still won't work correctly.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

I tried this suggestion and a slightly different one online that involved actually changing text in the persistedsettings file, neither worked. One of the practice games I was in where it was not working, I literally palmed the left side of my keyboard and it started worked.... I don't...I don't understand...
I'm having the same issue, and this did not work for me.
